page.title: 18HORSHAM ARTS CENTRE & SPORT
page.content: The Horsham Arts Centre is a mixture between a theatre, cinema, drama club, ballet classes and playgroup. At the theatre I watched 'Cinderella' at Christmas and later I watched 'I have been here before'. They have some quite famous people there. At the cinema I watched 'Ghostbusters' and 'Passage to India'. They were both very good. Before being the Arts Centre, it was a cinema. When they knocked it down everyone was angry but most people like it now. Also in Horsham there is a town cricket club. For 10 - 18 year olds St Marys School also has a cricket club and play other schools on Saturdays. When you join the cricket club you can go and see any county match you want. In Horsham they play county cricket against other counties.
